landing.title: Trail Fit Uploader - Trail Running Analysis
landing.hero_subtitle: Join our community research project. Contribute your trail running data to help advance sports science, and get detailed insights into your performance in return.
landing.symbiotic_relationship: A symbiotic relationship between science and sport
landing.step1_desc: Upload your .fit files from your favorite watch. Add context like fatigue, weather, and trail conditions.
landing.step2_desc: We process your data using advanced physiological models to understand the demands of trail running.
landing.step3_desc: Get immediate feedback and statistical breakdowns of your effort, helping you train smarter.

upload.title: Upload - Trail Fit Uploader
upload.drop_file: Drop .fit file here or click to browse
upload.fatigue_desc:
1: High accumulated fatigue (Not recommended)
2: High fatigue but manageable
3: Somewhat fatigued but fit to train
4: Slight discomfort
5: Fully recovered
upload.general_sensation_desc:
1: Very bad
2: Bad
3: Normal
4: Good
5: Very good
upload.sleep_desc:
1: Very bad
2: Bad
3: Normal
4: Good
5: Very good
upload.hydration_desc: If unsure, select 'Uncertain'. Starting activity dehydrated is not recommended.
upload.weather_desc: Select the predominant weather condition during the activity
upload.trail_desc: Select the predominant trail condition during the activity

privacy_policy_page.section1_content: We collect the data you explicitly provide to us when you upload your activity files (.fit files) and the associated metadata (e.g., fatigue levels, weather conditions). This includes:
privacy_policy_page.section1_list2: Activity data (GPS, heart rate, pace, cadence, etc.)
privacy_policy_page.section2_content: Your data is used for the Trail Fit Research Project to understand the physiological demands of trail running. We may aggregate your data with other users to publish scientific findings.
privacy_policy_page.section3_content: We implement appropriate security measures to protect against unauthorized access to or unauthorized alteration, disclosure, or destruction of data.
privacy_policy_page.section4_content: If you have any questions about this Privacy Policy, please contact us at research@trailfit.io.
